settings.title: Discover Our Beautiful Bouquets
settings.description: Explore our collection of exquisite bouquets and surprise your loved ones with the perfect gift. Click the button below to start shopping.
settings.shop-promo: flex flex-col gap-8 px-4 py-10 border-brand-black border-y text-center items-center md:p-20 md:gap-10
settings.shop-promo__button: text-mobile-button font-medium uppercase flex gap-3 items-center justify-center bg-black text-white h-[46px] w-[270px] md:text-desktop-button tracking-[0.025em] md:tracking-[0.03em] md:h-[56px] border-brand-black hover:bg-transparent hover:text-black border transition fade duration 300 ease-out

settings.about_us__container_right_description: We are a modern local floral studio, which specializes in the design and delivery of unique bouquets. We have the best florists who carefully select each look, our studio cooperates directly with farms for growing different flowers, so we always have fresh flowers, which are collected by our florists in exquisite bouquets. We have a collection of fresh bouquets, collections of dried bouquets, house plants, as well as fragrant candles from luxury brands to create the perfect atmosphere. Make someone's day amazing by sending flowers, plants and gifts the same or next day. Ordering flowers online has never been easier.
settings.about_us__container_left: w-full px-4 py-10 border-brand-black border border-t-0 gap-4 md:p-20 lg:border-r-0
settings.about_us__container_right: w-full px-4 py-10 border-brand-black border border-t-0 md:p-20 lg:border-r-0 lg:border-l-1
settings.about_us__container_right_button_classes: text-brand-black uppercase hover:bg-brand-black hover:text-white text-mobile-button font-medium border border-brand-black pt-4 pb-[14px] px-6 tracking-[0.025em] w-full md:w-[175px] md:h-[56px] md:tracking-[0.03em] md:text-desktop-button

settings.contact: w-full dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-white py-10 text-center mx-auto
settings.contact__style--form: mt-5 md:mt-7 w-full mx-auto px-6 md:w-3/5
settings.contact__style--input: w-full px-2 py-1 text-sm md:text-base border rounded-md bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:border-gray-600 dark:placeholder-gray-400 dark:text-white dark:focus:ring-primary-500 dark:focus:border-primary-500
settings.contact__style--textarea: w-full px-2 py-1 text-sm md:text-base border rounded-md bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:border-gray-600 dark:placeholder-gray-400 dark:text-white dark:focus:ring-primary-500 dark:focus:border-primary-500
settings.contact__submit-button: py-1 px-2 block mx-auto md:py-3 md:px-5 md:w-full text-sm font-medium text-center bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md border cursor-pointer bg-primary-700 border-primary-600 hover:bg-blue-800 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-primary-300 dark:bg-primary-600 dark:hover:bg-primary-700 dark:focus:ring-primary-800
